data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reboleira, Ana Sofia P. S., Sendra, Alberto, Gonçalves, Fernando, Oromí, Pedro (2010): The first hypogean dipluran from Portugal: description of a new species of the genus Litocampa (Diplura: Campodeidae). Zootaxa 2728: 50-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200090
